subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Churchill Downs will host the Breeders’ Cup championships for a seventh time on Nov. 5-6, 2010, the event’s first trip to the track since the Cup expanded to a two-day format in 2007. The 27th Breeders’ Cup will feature 14 championship races with a projected $25.5 million in purses available.
